title: CURSER NOT WORKING
body: THIS IS THE SECOND TIME ITS HAPPENED TO ME, I JUST JOINED A RANKED GAME AND I GET IN AND MY CURSER STAYS AS THE PC ARROW NOT THE HAND WITH INDEX FINGER, I CANT OPEN SHOP, CANT MOVE, CANT PUT ANY POINTS IN MY ABILITIES. NOW IM GOING TO GET REPORTED FOR ABANDONING MY TEAM. WTF RIOT.

replies.body: No i didnt have it open, and it really shouldn't make a difference. I have played with discord before with no issues. its been in this last patch

Discord overlay specifically has been causing issues recently, so it could be a bad interaction between the overlay and the game. Usually this type of issue is the result of something over the top of the League window not functioning as intended. Discord by default does open automatically so it's worth a check.
Update. He disabled discord and got through an entire game with no slip ups. Just make sure its not running in the background or something (as his was). Other then that i got no idea.

Yeah same as my friend and i can have it open with no problems. Just trying anything at this point. Others have tried repairing and reinstalling with no success thus far. Must be on Riots end.

Strange that its not affecting everyone though
yea it is strange, more spaghetti code
Do you by any chance have discord open? My friend has exactly the same issue and we are working on it now.
